caption:
Three of the biggest trophy curses in sporting history are potentially ending in the same month! 🏆

✅ Harry Kane has finally ended his 26-year-long trophy drought this month by winning the Bundesliga with Bayern Munich. 

✌️ Son Heung-min & Tottenham could end their century-long trophy drought this month — they need just two wins to lift the Europa League!

🥺 The GOAT of cricket, Virat Kohli, and his RCB could finally end their IPL trophy curse this month! They’re top of the table, just one win away from the knockouts, and strong favourites to go all the way — potentially ending Kohli’s 18-year wait!

Either the world ends after this month… or it goes down as one of the most legendary months in sports history. 🔚
